sentence: "I endorsed [Starbuck] months ago and I stand by my endorsement," tweeted Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C. "I endorsed Robby months ago & believe he's exactly what we need in these difficult times," wrote Trump-backed Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Trump has it completely wrong: Allies revolt after Trump endorses rival to MAGA darling

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn and Sen. Rand Paul endorsed Starbuck before Trump and pressed back on Trump's endorsement.
author: Christopher Hutton
title: Trump-endorsed Morgan Ortagus announces Tennessee run for Congress

sentence: Mr. Starbuck had also nabbed a high-profile endorsement, from Representative Madison Cawthorn, Republican of North Carolina.
author: Azi Paybarah
title: Tennessee G.O.P. Removes Trump-Backed House Candidate From Ballot

sentence: Starbuck, a filmmaker backed by Republican Representatives Marjorie Taylor Greene and Madison Cawthorn, blasted the process and said the party "declared war on TN voters yesterday."
author: Aaron Navarro
title: Tennessee GOP kicks Trump-backed candidate Morgan Ortagus off congressional primary ballot
